channel.title: How big is your computer monitor?
channel.description: Also if you have a cheap and nasty BulkaBox CRT monitor, please also reply to this thread explaining why you bought such a junk monitor :rolleyes:.

item.title: How big is your computer monitor?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Cheatest, post:19, topic:13684”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=20407.msg232290#msg232290 date=1157896437]
19" Dell CRT.

CRT moniters are the best for games.
[/quote]

Are you an idiot? they glare there bright they shine they light up the room do i have to go on about the same thing?[/quote]

CRT screens are the best, because on LCD you need to be in one posistion and if you move the color changes because of the glare. It’s like it on laptops. However, nomatter where you are in the room the CRT remains the same color.

Read full topic
item.source: How big is your computer monitor?

item.title: How big is your computer monitor?
item.dc:creator: @Aukake Aukake
item.description:
@Aukake wrote:

[quote=“Cheatest, post:19, topic:13684”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=20407.msg232290#msg232290 date=1157896437]
19" Dell CRT.

CRT moniters are the best for games.
[/quote]

Are you an idiot? they glare there bright they shine they light up the room do i have to go on about the same thing?[/quote]

Uhm… Refresh rates on CRT’s own refresh rates on any flat panel, no matter how expensive/quality the lcd. Which makes them ideal for gaming, mainly fps.

Sidenote: NFS: Most Wanted is the shit!

Read full topic
item.source: How big is your computer monitor?
